overview.ovdesc: This is a live file updated when MULTI.PROD.FAC is set to YES in Facility

desc.p: This holds tranche reference number which is used to define the tranche level utilisation on the Product for a Phased out Disbursement
This field holds the amount utilised at tranche level against each product
This field holds the amount yet to utilise at tranche level against each product . It can be utilised only when the commitment available amount under the respective tranche exists.
This holds the currency of the FACILITY contract
This is the id of FACILITY
This indicates the maximum amount that can be utilised against the product
This holds Product type set in FACILITY when multi product is defined.Possible values are LN,GT and SC
